pageContext.description:
Charity, the personification of benevolence, is depicted as a seated woman breastfeeding a child, while being embraced by another. She sits on a stone block next to an apple tree. A small boy has climbed up the tree and throws apples down to a girl below. 

[Herrschaft, cda 2015]

pageContext.signature:
Artist's insignia in the bottom right corner of the painting, on the stone bench: winged serpent with elevated wings facing left; in black paint.

[Pérez Simón Collection, revised 2013]
